reserveohio.name: ReserveOhio (Ohio State Parks)
reserveohio.notes: Book opens exactly 6 calendar months before arrival at 7 AM ET. Max 14 nights in any 30-day period. Peak holidays (Memorial Day, July 4th, Labor Day) require 3-night minimum. One free modification; $6 fee after.

recreation_gov.name: Recreation.gov (Federal/National Parks)
recreation_gov.notes: Book opens exactly 180 days before arrival at 10 AM ET. Cancellation fee of $10 within 14 days.

reserveamerica.name: ReserveAmerica (State Parks - Various)
reserveamerica.notes: Rules vary by state. Default is 6 calendar months. Check your specific state park system for overrides.
